results:
Based on my web search results, I found information about youth reactions to "Dune: Part Two" and Timothée Chalamet's appeal to younger audiences. Here's what the search revealed:

## Youth and Gen Z Reactions to "Dune: Part Two"

Critics praised Timothée Chalamet and Zendaya as being "INCREDIBLE" in the film, with some noting that "Timothee Chalamet and Zendaya have never been better."(no content)The film was described by some critics as "The Definitive Sci-Fi Epic Of A Generation."

### Timothée Chalamet's Appeal to Young Audiences

The film's marketing campaign specifically noted that "The leading role of Paul Atreides, played by Timothée Chalamet, was a huge pull for a younger audience and new fans."(no content)To leverage this appeal, the marketing team "implemented a follow strategy with the fan accounts and made a point to actively engage with them" and "kept daily conversations with fans ongoing on TikTok rather than just doing one-off replies."(no content)Director Denis Villeneuve observed that the young cast "receive an incredible amount of demand and curiosity from young people. These actors bring out a lot of passion in teenagers and young adults, and I love the fact that they are bringing young people to the theaters. So they are the movie stars of the future, and they will talk to the new generation."

### Chalamet's Performance and Character Relatability

Chalamet himself noted that his character Paul Atreides reflects "universal struggles teenagers experience," playing "the son in a political family embroiled in a galactic battle, who is trying to make his parents proud and figure out what kind of man he wants to be," saying these are "things that all of us struggle with when we're at that age [15], when we don't know who we are, when we're trying to find ourselves."(no content)In the original novel, "Paul Atreides is only 15 years old," and "Chalamet's natural slight frame adds a layer of realism to Paul's character" since "most 15-year-old boys aren't very big."

### Social Media Reactions and Fan Engagement

Social media reactions praised how "So many young stars get to craft definitive work" in the film. Fan reactions on social media highlighted "the on-screen chemistry between Zendaya & Timothee Chalamet" and noted that "Timothee Chalamet & Zendaya so beautifully capture the essence of the warm yet tragic Paul Atreides & Chani relationship. These two will be two of our biggest movie stars for so many years to come. As will the equally magnificent Austin Butler & Florence Pugh."

### Contemporary Relevance for Young Audiences

Chalamet believed the film's themes resonate with today's youth, noting that "a young generation motivated by social justice causes could see parallels in Dune" with "themes remain really relevant about fighting for what's right socially, fighting for what's right environmentally, standing up for groups that are easily oppressed or that don't have the agency to fight back."

The search results indicate that "Dune: Part Two" was particularly successful in engaging younger audiences, largely due to Timothée Chalamet's star power and the film's themes that resonate with Gen Z's concerns about social justice and identity formation.
